title: Cenk Uygur on The Young Turks, His Campaign, and Media Coverage of Progressives
description:
Cenk Uygur joins the show to talk about founding the Young Turks, his congressional campaign, and covering progressive politics. Matt and Katie debut a new segment ‘The Most Stoned Moments of the Campaign’
